original_text: The locusts flew into every part of the country of Egypt. Thousands of locusts sat on everything. There had never been so many locusts in Egypt before. And it will never happen again.
korean_text: 메뚜기가 애굽 온 땅에 이르러 그 사방에 내리매 그 피해가 심하니 이런 메뚜기는 전에도 없었고 후에도 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: The locusts flew into every part
Thousands of locusts sat on everything
sentences.korean_translation: 수천 마리의 메뚜기가 모든 것에 앉았습니다

sentences.original_text: There had never been so many locusts
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 많은 메뚜기는 한 번도 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: And it will never happen again
